laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC: 12, BUN: 72, Cr: 3.8 (baseline Cr ~2.5, recently d/c w/ Cr 3.1), HCO3: 16 (AG: 22), Glu: 361, Lactate: 1.8

Interval progression of elevated transplant kidney resistive indices; little if any diastolic flow identified with resistive indices now approaching 1. Main renal artery peak systolic velocity increasing, 191 cm/s. No hydronephrosis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increasing peak systolic velocity and worsening resistive indices.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Incidental right pleural effusion. A 2.5 x 1.5 cm rounded isoechoic mass in the inferior aspect of the right hepatic lobe. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. Main portal vein patency confirmed.
